actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Second Liberty Bond Act to provide a cost-of-living adjustment for savings and bonds and savings certificates which mature in 10 years.

summary.text: Provides, under the Second Liberty Bond Act, for a cost-of-living adjustment for savings bonds and savings certificates which mature in ten years. (Amends 31 U.S.C. 757 c(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Second Liberty Bond Act to provide a cost-of-living adjustment for savings and bonds and savings certificates which mature in 10 years.
